  • Method Details

    • archiveFile

      public static void archiveFile(File file, String archiveLocation) throws IOException
      This will move the file to its archive location. This uses File and not InboundFile or InboundInputFile
      Parameters:
      file - the file
      archiveLocation - the new location
      Throws:
      IOException - if the move fails

    • isWritableDirectory

      public static boolean isWritableDirectory(String dirName)

    • isReadableDirectory

    • validateFileHandlerClass

      @Deprecated public static String validateFileHandlerClass(String handlerClass)
      Deprecated.
      use either validateFileHandlerClassNoThrow(String) or validateFileHandlerClassThrow(String)
      This is the old implementation. It returns the thrown exception's message.
      Parameters:
      handlerClass - the class
      Returns:
      the exception message or null

    • validateFileHandlerClassNoThrow

      public static String validateFileHandlerClassNoThrow(String handlerClass)
      This will validate that the FileHandler is an appropriate type
      Parameters:
      handlerClass - the string with the type name
      Returns:
      the message from the exception

    • validateFileHandlerClassThrow

      public static void validateFileHandlerClassThrow(String handlerClass) throws InboundFileConfigException
      This will validate that the FileHandler is an appropriate type. This will throw an exception if not valid. The handler can either implement InboundFileLineHandler or InboundFileHandler. Although not checked by this method, a constructor with a config InboundFileConfig is called to instantiate the handler.
      Parameters:
      handlerClass - the string with the type name
      Throws:
      InboundFileConfigException

    • exceptionMessage

      public static String exceptionMessage(Throwable e)

    • createFileHandler

      public static InboundFileHandler createFileHandler(InboundFileConfig inboundConfig)
      Instantiate a new InboundFileHandler using property from InboundFileConfig as the full pathname of the class to create and bind file handler to config.
      Parameters:
      inboundConfig - inbound config to be bind to.
      Returns:
      a new instance of the specified class.

    • buildInboundFile

      public static InboundFile buildInboundFile(InboundFileHandler handler, InboundInputFile file)
      This will create a new InboundFile entity from the InboundInputFile and the handler. Note that this will commit the new entity to the database, so
      Parameters:
      handler - the handler
      file - the InboundInputFile
      Returns:
      an entity

    • md5ToHex

      public static String md5ToHex(String md5)

    • lookupConfig

      public static InboundFileConfig lookupConfig(String key)
      This will find the configuration for the key
      Parameters:
      key - the config name
      Returns:
      the config entity if found
